name: Pew Pew Pets
description:
A virtual pet/top down arena shooter game I made in 1 week to learn Lua/PICO-8. The objective of the game is to level up your pet and try to get past Wave 10.

Check out how I made it in this devlog:

Controls:

  • Move - ESDF (as opposed to WASD)
  • Shoot - Left Click/Hold with Mouse
